summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Brightening Eye Serum is a multi-tasking eye serum that brightens, tightens and firms to help blur fine lines and tone skin around the eye. The illuminating effect delivers instant gratification, targeting dark circles for an immediate pick-me-up.
details: DetailsBenefitsGlides across skin with beautiful slip and melts in effortlesslyLightweight textureEncourages brighter, more youthful-looking eye areaFormulated with revitalizing Caffeine and Squalane to help reduce puffiness and brighten tired eyesKey IngredientsReplenishing Glycerin and SqualeneRevitalizing, firming Caffeine and Arnica MontanaCentella Asiatica ExtractSodium HyaluronateNiacinamideItem 2588969How To UseApply one pump of Brightening Eye Serum on ring finger and gently press into skin along the orbital bone. Eye brightening serum can also be used on eyelids. For best results, use both morning and night to help smooth fine lines and wrinkles. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply one pump of Brightening Eye Serum on ring finger and gently press into skin along the orbital bone. Eye brightening serum can also be used on eyelids. For best results, use both morning and night to help smooth fine lines and wrinkles. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

reviews.headline: Rash
reviews.comments: Normally I give products generous reviews but for this product I simply can't. I have bought two different sprays from Mario Badescu and one made me break out but the other was wonderful so when my mother was interested in buying this product I told her to go for it. Worst mistake of my life telling her to buy it. The product gave her the worst rash under her eyes and she described it as a "Horrible stinging pain". She tried to put Vaseline on it and it did absolutely nothing to her horrible rash. Even looking at these pictures makes me sick to my stomach. If you're thinking about buying this product DONT. My mother and I have tried multiple different eye brightening products and this is by far the absolute worst.

reviews.headline: I would recommend
reviews.comments: A subtle but noticeable brightening of the undereye area

reviews.headline: Under eye circles SIGNIFICANTLY REDUCED
reviews.comments: I have very dark under eye circles that ive delt with for a long time. I've always used an eye cream that is supposed to help brighten but haven't ever seen good results. I've tried good molecules, tula, all of them. THIS IS THE BEST ONE. Purchase immediately. I did minimal makeup and opted not to use concealer (which is something I ALWAYS use because of my undereyes) thats how much it has helped. I use twice a day every day. Will be repurchasing I LOVE IT!! ACTUALLY WORKS BUYYY ITTTT

reviews.headline: Great daytime eye cream
reviews.comments: This eye brightening serum is great for the daytime and combines well with makeup. It is very light and doesn't crease my concealer. The only issue is when there is only a small amount, the packaging makes it difficult for the serum to come out. Otherwise, this is a great product and I would purchase it again!

reviews.headline: Didn't soak into skin
reviews.comments: I decided to give this a try. I normally use an It Cosmetics eye cream that brightens under my eyes. This is more of an eye cream than a serum in texture. It also didn't really soak into my skin. I could easily swipe under my eye and remove all the cream. My IT Cosmetics eye cream soaks in and can't be swiped away if I try to put make up on.

reviews.headline: Love this eye serum!
reviews.comments: Bought this serum to try to brighten the eye area- I do a lot of Zoom meetings and needed to minimize dark circles below my eyes. This helps so much! Will buy again-

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Didn't seem to do what I was looking for

reviews.headline: I would buy again and again!
reviews.comments: Love so far! I'm 38 and I need a little help and this is doing the trick. I love all their products.

reviews.headline: Not a good eye brightener
reviews.comments: Did not like product, not sure if this product was the cause but several white bumps (milia) began to appear on my eyelid and under eye when I've never had them before.

reviews.headline: illuminating
reviews.comments: i have been using this product for about two months. I will say it actually works. I have VERRRRRRY sensitive skin and when one tries everything and finally finds something that works, it. is. awesome!!!!!! it didn't burn or leave hives under my eyes like most products do and it actually makes my under eye feel and look more hydrated. my under eyes and have been overly dry since I turned 35. (almost 40 now;)) . buy it!

reviews.headline: AWFUL smell
reviews.comments:
**I got this product as a sample from a free gift with one of my Ulta orders** 
This product smelled like chives. It was extremely off putting, so much so that I threw it out. As far as the immediate appearance of my skin after using this, there wasn't much difference. It was stored in my home in a cool dry place as the packaging instructs. I hope the quality of this sample isn't reflective of the rest of the brand.

reviews.headline: I will buy again.
reviews.comments: I put this under my eyes,  I'm not sure it brightens' my eyes too much but it does some.  It absorbs well and leaves a smooth under eye for concealer and a touch of powder, making it look smoother.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: Love this eye serum! Instant results!

reviews.headline: Yes!! Amazing eye serum!
reviews.comments: Love it! Amazing! Not to heavy and really targets the dark circles!

reviews.headline: Yes i buy the Mario Badescu Skin Care Brightening Eye Serum
reviews.comments: I truly love the Mario Badescu Skin Care Brightening Eye Serum

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I am a skin care junkie. From high end to drug store products I love trying new things. I got this product in a Mario set with a bunch of minis and WOW I am blown away. After one use I can significantly see the difference in my under eyes. They are at least 50% brighter, from ONE TIME. And my bags are discoloration are noticeable. I will be purchasing the full product!

reviews.headline: Perfect daytime eye cream
reviews.comments: This is a light weight daytime eye cream, glides right on and is perfect under concealer. I use it when I'm not wearing makeup too. It really does brighten the under eye, has a sheer shimmer to it but very slight. Easy to use with the pump, I save my heavier eye creams for night time. Just bought one for my mom and will def rebuy when mine runs out too!

reviews.headline: Good eye serum
reviews.comments:
I really liked this eye serum. I've tried his other eye creams in the past, which I thought were fairly good, but I like this the best.

I have sensitive eyes and had no reaction when I put this on after washing my face. It went on like butter and absorbed immediately. 

My under eyes looked smooth and bright. Sometimes I felt like his other eye creams didn't absorb all the way, but I didn't have that problem with this serum.

reviews.headline: Not Worth It
reviews.comments: It did burn a bit when I applied it under my eyes. I also did not see that it took away the darkness from under my eyes nor did it calm my bags. It's a no for me.

reviews.headline: not bad
reviews.comments: so, i don't think this brightens or anything but it feels decent to put under the eyes & on the eyelids. this may be good to use starting out with skin care but there's no brightening effect on me personally.

faceoff_positive.comments: I wanted to leave a review since this is new and I just bought it today.  I did end up layering it.  I put this on first and let it sink in a few minutes, then followed with my normal face moisturizer.  It's almost 8pm and I've been up since 4am but my eyes do look more refreshed than normally. Helped with the puffiness I had and added  illumination. I have really sensitive skin and I'm fine so im not sure why other review said it burned.  I'm happy with it and may buy a second for my purse!
faceoff_positive.headline: Give it a try!

faceoff_negative.comments: Normally I give products generous reviews but for this product I simply can't. I have bought two different sprays from Mario Badescu and one made me break out but the other was wonderful so when my mother was interested in buying this product I told her to go for it. Worst mistake of my life telling her to buy it. The product gave her the worst rash under her eyes and she described it as a "Horrible stinging pain". She tried to put Vaseline on it and it did absolutely nothing to her horrible rash. Even looking at these pictures makes me sick to my stomach. If you're thinking about buying this product DONT. My mother and I have tried multiple different eye brightening products and this is by far the absolute worst.
faceoff_negative.headline: Rash
